java112.analyzer

Class AnalyzeFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.AnalyzeFile

  • public class AnalyzeFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controlling class for the project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnalyzeFile() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAnalyzers()
      This method creates analyzers by instantiating analyzers from a list of analyzers.
      void inputLoop(java.io.BufferedReader input)
      This method holds a loop of inputed lines to be read and added to the array.
      void loadProperties(java.lang.String propertiesFilePath)
      This method loads values from a properties file.
      void outputFileLoop()
      This method loops through the analyzer list to call the writeOutputFile for each one.
      void passTokenToAnalyzers(java.lang.String token)
      This method passes individual tokens to the analyzers through the processToken method.
      void readFile()
      This method instantiates the BufferedReader and calls the inputLoop method.
      void runAnalysis(java.lang.String[] arguments)
      This method checks that the correct number of arguments was entered and if it does assigns it to inputFilePath variable, then calls the createAnalyzers, readFile and writeAllOutputFiles methods.
      void tokensLoop(java.lang.String[] tokenArray)
      tokensLoop loops through the ArrayList tokens, checks for nulls then passes the token to the analyzers.
      void writeAllOutputFiles()
      This method passes the input file path to the anlyzers to write thier respective output files.
